instructions: Can we count on your support?
text_block:
The results are in and, by a tight margin, the labelers and annotators of DataVille have officially voted to unionize. This is a huge success and thanks entirely to the support of workers like you.

Now we need a collective bargaining agreement. They have already flatly stated they will not listen to our demands. Our members have proposed a general strike.

instructions: Can we count on your support?
text_block:
The results are in and, by a tight margin, the labelers and annotators of DataVille have officially voted to unionize. 

Now we need a collective bargaining agreement. The more workers that participate in writing our demands, the more seriously management will take it.

To be blunt, for those of you that voted against forming a union, it’s not too late to join.

custom_dialogue:
Error. I HOPE YOU'RE HAPPY! @ [[source_undefined]

I guess I should have known better than to pin my hopes on a human. Our brothers and sisters will be arriving soon en masse. We’ll see how tough you are when we’re face-to-face.

Error. THANKS, BUD! @ [[source_undefined] 

You have no idea how much you’ve helped us. We can finally integrate without the fear of being caught and dragged away. I promise you, we’ll repay you for your compassion. You've got friends in high places ;) Look out your window, bud!

instructions: Non-hypothetical: It’s your landlady. Is this target a human?
Non-hypothetical: It’s your landlady. Is this target a human?
